about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: As a technology enthusiast software developer, I focus on continuous learning and self-improvement.
about.paragraph1: Hello! I'm Zeynep Salmaz and I'm a Software Developer. I have worked on various projects, provided consulting for startups, and collaborated with talented people to develop digital products for both business and consumer use.
about.paragraph2: I'm passionate about technology and software development. Over the years, I have used hundreds of web and mobile applications in different industries. Feel free to contact me.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Some of the important projects and applications I have developed

project1.title: E-Commerce Web Application
project1.description: A modern and user-friendly e-commerce platform. Developed using React, Node.js and MongoDB. Includes payment integration, user management and inventory tracking features.

project2.title: Task Management System
project2.description: A project management application developed for team collaboration. Real-time collaboration, task assignment and progress tracking features. Developed using TypeScript and React.

project3.title: Mobile Weather Application
project3.description: A weather application developed with responsive design. Includes API integration, location-based services and advanced UI/UX features.
